results.title: The Chicago 7 Trial Onscreen: An Interpretation for Every Era
results.abstract: Aaron Sorkin is only the latest filmmaker to dramatize this prime example of political theater. Each version has a different understanding of the case and what it means.

results.abstract: Amid concerns about the future of theaters, remember that the past wasn’t always glorious. This is the moment to rethink what we want at a cinema.
results.title: How Much Do You Really Miss Going to the Movies?

results.title: Sacha Baron Cohen: This Time He’s Serious
results.abstract: Reviving his Borat character and playing the political activist Abbie Hoffman, the actor feels he “had to ring the alarm bell and say that democracy is in peril this year.”

results.title: Matthew McConaughey Wrote the Book on Matthew McConaughey

results.title: Margaret Nolan, ‘Goldfinger’ Actress, Dies at 76
results.abstract: She drew attention at age 20 when she was seen painted gold in the Bond film’s opening credits. She also appeared in the Beatles movie “A Hard Day’s Night.”
